data.name: Vijos for Luogu
Minimal Coda
data.description: Make Coda look much cleaner by hiding the top toolbar. You can rely on / commands, keyboard shortcuts or markdown for most things. If you still want to use the toolbar, you can shrink your window to half the screen width and the toolbar will show up temporarily.

data.name: PaymoApp Tuneup
骇客煎蛋~
data.description:
主色调是黑色和绿色，优化了很多的颜色设置。
添加了背景
更新了吐槽颜色
和 Jandan Night Mode 一起用超赞的 很有质感.

data.name: Claris (FileMaker) Community for small display
data.description:
Claris Community (FileMaker Community) for small display.
The title is "for small display" but I think it will be easier to see on a large display.
https://community.claris.com/

user.about: The title is "for 11 inches" but I think it will be easier to see on a large display.
